title: League keeps disconnecting but internet is fine
body: Every single game i play in league i disconnect from the game and it says attempting to reconnect and about a minute goes by and im back in. Sometimes it happens twice a game depending how long the game goes. During that minute i can go and use the internet. So my internet is still working while this is happening. It also seems to happen more when im using curse talking to buddies but still happens when im playing solo. I have not been able to play ranked in months because of this issue. As you can imagine its very frustrating! If any one knows what the problem is and how to fix it that would be greatly appreciated!

replies.body: I'm having the same problem and it just started yesterday. Every game before minions spawn I DC then come back in after 45sec-1min. I already reinstalled, used HRT, and sent my HRT logs so we'll see what happens. Just wanted to let you know you're not the only one this is happening to.

Even though your internet might be working, your network can still have issue specifically connecting to the game server.  I recommend going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions, but this should do the trick!
followed every step and i thought it was working but it didnt! im still having the same issue. any other suggestions?

Thanks for the update!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can look into your specific issue individually.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain a set of logs, and attach it to your ticket for context.  We'll respond asap!
